text: In animal science, cannibalism is where an animal eats its own species. Scientists have found more than 1500 species that do this.G. A. Polis, The evolution and dynamics of intraspecific predation. Annual Review of Ecology and Systematics 12, 225-251 (1981). It is common with insects, spiders and scorpions. There, the male gets eaten by the female, after having sexual intercourse. Many types of frogs will also eat other frogs of the same species. Even, vertebrates like hedgehogs eat their offspring if stressed. == References == == Further reading == * Category:Carnivores Category:Cannibalism
title: Cannibalism in animals
